price: Those who believe and do righteous deeds, We will not let the reward of those who do good deeds to go to waste.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ مَنۡ أَحۡسَنَ عَمَلًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
